entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as sleeping under the stairs and having a cupboard full of spiders.

entities.name: duddy
entities.description: Duddy is Harry's cousin. He is mentioned as receiving many birthday presents, including a new computer, television, and racing bike.

entities.name: spider
entities.description: A spider is mentioned in the story as being on one of Harry's socks.

relationships.description: Harry and Duddy are cousins, as indicated by the text.
Harry encounters a spider on one of his socks.
